I am Avant-Garde, the Transformatron Wizard. My young friend, I am not a wizard of the Ivory Tower. You look surprised! Think of me as a wanderer who acquired a special power quite by chance... My magic, however, requires some very specialized items. If you have acquired these unique items from the dark wizard in Hardin's Academy , I can help you!
